name: Serrapeptase
description: Proteolytic enzyme originally isolated from silkworm gut bacteria. Breaks down inflammatory proteins, fibrin, and scar tissue. Used in European and Japanese medicine for inflammation and pain. Often combined with nattokinase for synergistic fibrinolytic effect.

dosage.notes: Take on empty stomach (2hr from food). Enteric-coated essential. SPU = Serratiopeptidase Units. Often combined with nattokinase.

keyFindings: Reduced post-surgical swelling and pain in multiple clinical trials
Anti-biofilm properties — may support antibiotic efficacy
Approved pharmaceutical in Japan and some European countries
